product_name: Columbia Greater Outdoors T-Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're headed off on vacation or savoring the last few hours of the weekend, it's easy to feel relaxed in the soft, breathable cotton of the Columbia Greater Outdoors T-shirt. Lightweight, easy-care cotton feels soft against skin; fabric offers 15 UPF sun protection. Closeout.
